kpi_info.title: M5213C1
kpi_info.use: Severely Errored Seconds (SES):Counts the number of seconds that contain a defect. Defect: BFD down in the ingress or egress direction. SES are not incremented during Unavailable Seconds (UAS). Standard: [G.826]. The counter is incremented when a second contains a defect. The counter is not incremented during periods of unavailable time (UAS). The value of the counter is updated every second.
